package.name: Validate_ISPAN
package.summary: Validation class for ISPAN (International Standard Product Numbers)
package.description: Package containes ISPAN (International Standard Product Numbers) validations such as: * ISSN * ISBN * ISMN * EAN8 * EAN13 * EAN14 * UCC12 * SSCC

release.notes: - Split from Validate into independent package - CS fixes - Added issn and product_numbers tests
